name: spomky-labs/jose
description: JSON Object Signing and Encryption library for PHP.

suggest.lib-openssl: Required to use AES based algorithms (except AES-GCM) and for RSA/EC keys conversions.
suggest.ext-crypto: Required to use AES GCM based algorithms.
suggest.ext-mcrypt: Required to use AES based (except AES-GCM) algorithms (only needed if lib-openssl is not enabled).
suggest.phpseclib/phpseclib: Required to use RSA based algorithms and for AES based algorithms (only if lib-openssl and ext-mcrypt are not enabled).
suggest.mdanter/ecc: Required to use Elliptic Curves based algorithms
